EmailTemplate.name: MBO Partners - Call follow up and introduction (1386004604.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners - Call follow up and introduction (1386004604.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Jim, It was a pleasure speaking with you today. As we discussed, I think there is some opportunity here to get you enrolled in our “Affiliate Program” which would compensate you for qualified referrals that you send our way. At this point in the process I would like to introduce you to David Putt (copied above) who will be your point of contact for set up in this program. He can be reached directly at 703-793-6020. I also wanted to link you to my private landing page <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html> so you can see some of the details of the program offering that we provide to our “MBO Exec’s”. This should give you a solid foundation on our services and some content to supplement our discussion today. Best to you!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
